sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>cxs_rp_config</collection> <condition/> <description>Removes related search fields when changes are made to a table.</description> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Remove results from record producer</name> <order>500</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[if (current.operation() == "delete" && cxs_App.getBusiness(current).isOnRecordProducer()) cxs_App.getBusiness(current).removeFromRecordProducer(); else if (current.operation() == "update" && cxs_App.getBusiness(previous).isOnRecordProducer(true) && current.sc_cat_item.changes()) cxs_App.getBusiness(previous).removeFromRecordProducer();]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2014-07-24 14:53:36</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>190fb962370221003e7d40ed9dbe5df6</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Remove results from record producer</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Contextual Search" source="com.snc.contextual_search">67c7786c3cb1311068bcf327dfe37f57</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_190fb962370221003e7d40ed9dbe5df6</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2014-12-16 14:45:49</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=190fb962370221003e7d40ed9dbe5df6"/> </record_update>
